data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shimizu, Akira, Lelej, Arkady S., Loktionov, Valery M. (2015): Revision of the Palaearctic brood parasitic genus Nipponodipogon Ishikawa, 1965 of spider wasps (Hymenoptera: Pompilidae: Pepsinae). Zootaxa 3948 (3): 497-520, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3948.3.6
